snippet: Egypt’s official news agency says a criminal court has sentenced 14 people to death, including Mohamed Badie, the leader of the country’s banned Muslim Brotherhood.
abstract: Mohamed Badie, leader of Muslim Brotherhood, is sentenced to death along with 13 others by Giza Criminal Court in Egypt; case related to violence that occurred during 2013 ouster of then Pres Mohamed Morsi.
lead_paragraph: Egypt’s official news agency says a criminal court has sentenced 14 people to death, including Mohamed Badie, the leader of the country’s banned Muslim Brotherhood.

headline.print_headline: Middle East; Egypt: 14 Sentenced to Death
